name: It's a Date!
description:
It's Marco's first date with Star. Will he survive?

It's a Date!

A Star x Marco Choose Your Own Dating Sim Text Adventure Game. The choices you make in this game, good or bad, will affect the outcomes of some events that will unfold as you play. Some events have random outcomes, just like real life!

What it is: A Choose Your Own Adventure Game with several endings, random outcomes and many, many events.

How to Play: You pick an option at the end of a passage and go the route it brings you.

Contains teen romance suitable for a general audience ages 7 and up.
